metadata.title: CVE-2023-44488 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
VP9 in libvpx before 1.13.1 mishandles widths, leading to a crash relatedto encoding.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-44488` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvpx6 - 1.8.2-1ubuntu0.2
vpx-tools - 1.8.2-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
libvpx package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.2-1ubuntu0.2').
